Author: Audo#5667
Content:
Hello guys,

I read the messages posted here. I read the K64 AMA. Nothing has changed, no new information has been presented apart from another claim that it is all true.

Look guys, we have discussed this situation extensively within the team and

a) the investment claims are way off the chart and unrealistic
b) the K64 team has been unable to verify the claims with publicly nor directly to our team since the announcement was made (over 3 months ago)

Our conclusion still stands and we strongly recommend people to stay out of it. We don't cencor our Discord but I ask everyone to move this discussion to #talk-other-topics. Please do not promote K64 on our Discord.

I don't get why you guys are trying to spin up some drama about all this but I can assure you that our team is alligned on this matter.

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: with the NN mining, it is stated they get 75% of blocks

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: and implicit with that is that they should get 75% of mining rewards

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: however, it was closer to 50% of the mining rewards, so i made the decision that the NN should get 75% of the blocks and 75% of the mining rewards

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: if that is bad ethics, then i must have bad ethics

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: i believe i got one lucky block when i was notary mining, but we had a large mining pool that came in to snipe the large blocks which reduced the NN rewards from the expected 75% to 50%. that is statistically impossible in a randomly distribution
